job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Are you looking for new challenges or to make a career move to build on your software engineering skills? Do you have the technical chops to dig in deep into technical platform, and integration technologies? Do you want to have deep engagement with enterprise customers and directly observe the impact of your work? Are you jazzed by the idea of integrating multiple MS technologies into highly strategic customer focused scenarios? Are you interested in using your design, coding, troubleshooting skills to have an impact on design, best practices?  If you answered “Yes” to these questions, the WWL Engineering team is for you and we would love to have join us! - Within Worldwide Learning, we seek to empower learners around the world to acquire the skills enabling them to get a job, advance in their career and achieve more. Here is an opportunity for you to influence our learning programs and experiences designed to build world class capability for customers, partners, employees, and future generations. We reach millions of learners where they are, anytime, anywhere, and deliver experiences that support exploring, learning, practicing, and proving their skills.  We use Microsoft Business Applications (Dynamics 365, Power platform) and Microsoft’s technical stack to augment and enhance our ability to support learners throughout their learning journey across the diversity of our program offerings.  We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help design, develop and deliver reusable enterprise scenarios leveraging Business Applications & Power Platform which comprises of Dynamics 365, LogicApps, PowerApps, Flow, CDS, Power Automate and xRM. We are looking for a person who combines passion for customer, technical aptitude, is a team player.  As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, configuring, implementing the business requirements and features leveraging Dynamics 365 products that enable our mission critical business partners. This is a data-driven and fast paced environment - where Engineers are empowered to innovate and take ideas from conception to scale. It is a great opportunity to work on something highly strategic to Microsoft, especially since Business Applications is Microsoft's next billion-dollar business and we at WWL Engineering work closely with R&D team to drive feedback into the product through internal implementations, solving complex business problems. In this role, you’ll collaborate with cross-discipline teams to solve complex business challenges using the Dynamics 365 and Power Platform to enable successful delivery of our skilling programs and initiatives. You will also be expected to demonstrate ability to learn and adopt relevant new technologies, tools, methods and processes from Microsoft and industry. You will use every opportunity to build features to be reusable across multiple solutions, as well as leverage features from others in your solutions. To be successful in this role, you must have strong verbal and written communication skills, a positive attitude, and the creativity to tackle hard, ambiguous problems in innovate ways. You also thrive in a team environment that values cross-team collaboration and building on the success of others. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.  Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
